title: Huge Amazon sale: deals on Fire TV Stick, Kindle, Ring, Fire tablets and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: This weekend's best deals on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: We're rounding up this weekend's top deals from Amazon's latest sale, which includes impressive price cuts on its best-selling devices like the Fire TV Stick, the all-new Echo Show 10, the Kindle Paperwhite, Ring security camera, Fire tablets, and more.

Our favorite deals from Amazon's sale include the all-new Echo Show 10 on sale for a record-low price of $199.99 (was $249.99), a $50 discount on the Kindle Paperwhite, and Prime Members can get the Fire TV Stick Lite on sale for just $19.99. If you're interested in home security, Amazon also has the Ring Stick Up Cam on sale for 84.99(was $99.99), a $50 discount on the Ring Alarm 8-piece kit and the all-new Ring doorbell marked down to $79.99. See more of the top deals from Amazon below, and keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, so we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
